html:
11.24.20  8:09 pm   What genre do you consider your music?

     normal

      I don't know anything like it but I love it

11.24.20  8:09 pm   Can you give us a date and time of when you hope your video to be finished.

      Tuesday, March 26, 2019 at 2:40:00 PM

11.24.20  8:08 pm   Do you have any experience with Zen Buddhism?

     yes

     If so; explain.

     i had a page-a-day calendar which said many delightful things, some of which might even have been put into the calendar by mistake

11.24.20  7:52 pm   Are you excited for Christmas?

      i am excited for other reasons

11.24.20  7:00 pm   Really love your music, any timeframe when we can expect something new?

     you can expect any time you want. it will surely be more accurate than what i would expect, because my expectations for that are always wrong

     Your musical talent is absolutely insane, I'm self learning myself and would love to be able to produce songs like you have.

     one way to do it is to try to get revenge on every lousy song you've ever heard

11.24.20  6:48 pm   do you ever find it difficult to put your song ideas into the song?

     occasionally

     And if yes how do you manage to do so? 

     first, i must figure out whether the 'idea' is supposed to be the beginning of the song, or not the beginning. if it's the beginning, then just run through it in real time and then have more ideas while already in the song. if the idea is the middle, this is much more difficult because then you have to figure out what came before, which is like writing backwards. which for me is almost impossible. but i have developed some tricks for this, such as asking a trillion questions, trying 100 things, or, seeing what comes AFTER, and then continue from there and hope that somewhere along the line a beginning reveals itself in some kind of cyclical construct

11.24.20  6:42 pm   Are you working on anothing new?

      yes

11.24.20  6:26 pm   What was your favorite video to work on? 

      i would prefer to work on a new one to be my favorite

11.24.20  5:32 pm   where did the idea of actually making your own website full of random things about you?

      i realized it's more convenient than emailing the content to each person individually

11.24.20  5:21 pm   How long is the video you're working on right now,

     about 4 minutes and 10 seconds

     and how long do you want it to be?

     i thought i wanted to keep it under 3:30, but i did my best and the song is fine the way it is. it's much tighter than the previous draft, which was around 4:52

11.24.20  4:24 pm   i like your videos and was wondering how much longer the next vid will take you?

     i've been wondering this, every time i make a video

      stay safe :D

11.24.20  3:12 pm   How did you come up with the metaphor "shoe is drum" and what is the meaning behind it?

     in that case, i just needed something that really looked like a metaphor. did not want it to be any substantial actual metaphor, because that would distract from the main point, which is 'this is a metaphor.' which is actually not the point of most metaphors

      Also,  how do you come with your ideas like the ball and stick one? 

     just common sense

11.24.20  3:02 pm   What are the chords to the chorus of In California? Or is there somewhere I can find them? (I got about 3/4 of the way through by ear but I wanna make sure, and that last line is killer haha)

      if you list what you have i will tell you if anything is wrong with it

11.24.20  10:50 am   can you name the main character in your new video? by main character i mean the person that the song is mainly about :)

      sure, it will be the same as your name

11.24.20  10:19 am   I miss your songs so I went onto your wikipedia page and OMG YOU HAVE A WEBSITE! Just wanted you to know you're an amazing, awe-inspiring creator.

     holy font gallery you are very friendly

      Thanks for existing i guess. What's your fav animal?

     computers

11.24.20  9:39 am   does the song "maybe i could eat blades of grass" have any hidden meaning in the line "have you been abandoned and made an incoherent fool out of"?

      i don't consider that a song, but, the line might possibly represent my feelings about how the writing of that video was going at the time

11.24.20  9:33 am   what types of music to do you listen to?

      normal, regular,

11.24.20  8:07 am   why did you use so many capital letters in your answer to the question about rhyming "mall" 3 times?!

     it probably correlates with the length of the answer

     are you okay?

      are you

11.24.20  7:04 am   It seems like a lot of great artists are never satisfied with their work (like me, except I'm not a great artist, and I'm not an artist). Has there ever been a piece you've been (mostly) satisfied with?

      most of the time i feel half satisfied. some sort of negotiational agreement is usually reached

11.24.20  6:02 am   do you ever do something so crazy it just might work

      yes

11.24.20  5:33 am   What rhymes with orange?!?!?!? ^\(|_|^\)......

     drawings

     (btw you are a musical genius that has inspired the world in many ways. Don't let anyone tell you otherwise. YOU'RE AMAZING<3)

     holy smokes you've begun to engage in persuasion tactics

11.24.20  4:51 am   What is the texture of the moon?

      *moist*

11.24.20  3:39 am   What is you favorite video and why?

      they are all better than each other

11.24.20  2:52 am   how to be patient

      i will tell you later

11.24.20  2:19 am   Is christmas real?

      yes, despite its best efforts to be fake

11.24.20  1:12 am   Why do people drive on parkways and park on driveways??

      coincidence

11.24.20  12:47 am   Do you memorize all your songs?

     eventually

      If so, how you do it?

     playing it over and over during the writing process, then hearing it over and over during the production process. memorization is not required, but it is unavoidable after hearing it so many times

11.24.20  12:34 am   How does one go about acquiring motivation to do things?

      what would you like motivation do to

11.23.20  11:33 pm   what is music?

      music is classified as a secret sauce

11.23.20  11:24 pm   do you like music

      it's ok

11.23.20  10:32 pm   which of your songs took you the longest to write

      probably one of the ones i haven't finished writing

11.23.20  9:55 pm   Would it be a correct statement that you have not had a single second of rest while working on this supposed new video

      not even close

11.23.20  9:43 pm   Hi! I was wondering if you could share the chords for "just did a bad thing"?

      there are a lot of chords but the first one is C#-7 which likely is played as Esus2 over C#

11.23.20  9:42 pm   In your song "might quit", do you really advocate quitting school?

      not necessarily

11.23.20  9:40 pm   How goes it? And did you learn some cool 3d stuff?

      yes but not enough

11.23.20  9:29 pm   Would you say that Bill Wurtz is a genre of music?

      i think that makes sense, but i wouldn't say it. i would prefer to just keep making the music until someone else says it

11.23.20  9:22 pm   I have a small keyboard that I've used to write one or two songs in the past. but now whenever I look at it I get so overwhelmed by all of the different notes and options and things I can do that I end up not writing anything. Do you have any advice?

      i have an idea that may help simplify this. when you write, always use the same sound. You don't have to do this, but it sounds like a good idea for you right now. and also, it's what i do. writing, arranging, recording, producing, .... in some worlds these are many different people's jobs. so it can help to narrow it down to just one at a time. if you worry about which keyboard sounds you're playing on, while you're writing, your 'arranger'/'producer' self might distract from the writer

11.23.20  8:57 pm   Opinion on languages

      they are not only helpful and useful, but also a great source of abundant joy and boundless imaginative entertainment

11.23.20  8:45 pm   what is your next song?

      i will show you

11.23.20  8:43 pm   Lasagna is just spaghetti cake, right?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.23.20  8:39 pm   If you could only bring one thing to a deserted island what would you bring 

      instructions for how to get off the island

11.23.20  8:37 pm   What is your favorite visuals for a video?

      SENSIBLE

11.23.20  8:12 pm   Have your songs appeared on any radio station before

      that may be plausible

11.23.20  9:03 pm   what are you working on now

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

11.23.20  8:34 pm   can you give a millisecond sample of your next video

      yes i will do that

11.23.20  8:31 pm   Do you find comfort in the fact that people genuinely enjoy your music?

      yes but i can do better

11.23.20  8:07 pm   Will you ever consider making a new video>

      put it this way, i have never considered NOT making thousands of videos

11.23.20  7:03 pm   i have begun work on a play and am about 40 pages in (though still nowhere near finished), but i am suddenly haunted by a new idea that seems somehow even more vivid and well-formed than the one i've been working on. i made a commitment to finish my first play before i start anything else, and i've abandoned creative commitments too many times already to do it again this time. how can i get this new idea to stop distracting me from my original idea without forgetting it or losing momentum for it when it finally comes time to execute it?

     just write it down. and in the future, try to find ways to complete projects quicker

11.23.20  6:57 pm   Will your next song release on Spotify before the video hits YouTube?

      i will try my best to make it happen at exactly the same time

11.23.20  5:47 pm   When did you start making the video you're currently working on?

      too long ago, considering it's not very good
